title: Irises
description: Vase of irises on table with yellow background
provenance:
Joh. Meyer.[1] S. B. Slijper by 1956.[2] (Sold by Slijper in 1961).[3] (Eugene V. Thaw & Co., New York, New York);[4] Bruce B. Dayton, Minneapolis, Minnesota by 1969; gift to MIA in 1992.

[1] Per Slijper inventory.

[2] Inventory list no. 934.

[3] Per Slijper inventory, name of buyer not given.

[4] Label on reverse of painting.
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
